backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing one response per caller, with submitResponse preventing duplicates and checkResponse returning whether the caller submitted.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a name‑change update to the Valentine page and identifying affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend Valentine page components, styling, and backend hooks.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global border/background styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and including a build metadata comment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Initializes React Query and renders ValentinePage after validating the current path.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Generates 20 animated floating hearts with randomized positions, delays, and sizes for background decoration.
frontend/src/components/SuccessMessage.t: Displays animated success screen with heart confetti, celebratory text, and personalized name.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks calling backend methods to check and submit a Valentine's response.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Valentine-themed CSS including fonts, OKLCH variables, and custom animations for hearts, confetti, and UI micro‑interactions.
frontend/src/lib/shareSlug.ts: Defines the canonical Valentine slug and helpers for validating paths and generating share URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring InternetIdentityProvider and React Query before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ValentinePage.tsx: Interactive Valentine page with playful yes/no button behavior, animated no-button responses, name constant, and share/response handling logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, radii, shadows, and plugins including Valentine theme colors.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project features, requirements, and current state for an interactive Valentine page.
